gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Thunder 127, Kings 113
gameRecap.excerpt: Oklahoma City defeats Sacramento, 127-113. For Oklahoma City, Shai Gilgeous-Alexander led the way with 38 points (three 3PM) and seven assists with Jalen Williams adding 32 points, seven rebounds, and nine assists. Malik Monk led the way with 26 points (six 3PM) and five assists aided by Domantas Sabonis recording his league leading 17th triple-double of the season and his 35th straight double-double tallying 21 points, 11 rebounds, and 14 assists for Sacramento in the losing effort. Oklahoma City wins and improves to 36-17 on the season, while Sacramento moves to 30-22 with the loss.
